juzs.text: 51|31|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ej faristagon [-i Alloh taolo], koru ma'murijati sumo cist?»
51|32|[Faristagon] Guftand: «Mo ʙaroi [mucozoti] qavme mucrim [va gunahkor] firistoda sudaem
51|33|To sanghoe az gil [-i saxtsuda] ʙar sarason furu ʙorem
51|34|[Sanghoe] Ki nazdi Parvardigorat ʙaroi isrofkoron nison guzosta sudaast
51|35|Pas, mu'minonero, ki dar on [sahrhoi qavmi Lut] ʙudand, [pes az nuzuli azoʙ] ʙerun ovardem
51|36|Vale faqat jak xonavodaro joftem, ki [nisʙat ʙa avomiri ilohi] taslim ʙudand
51|37|Va dar on [sahrho] ʙaroi mardume, ki az azoʙi dardnok [-i ilohi] tars dorand, nisonae ravsan ʙar coj guzostem
51|38|Dar [dostoni] Muso [niz nisona va iʙratest]; on goh ki uro ʙo dalele ravsan nazdi Fir'avn firistodem
51|39|Vale [Fir'avn] ʙo takja ʙar qudratas [haqro] napaziruft va guft: [«In mard jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
51|40|Uro hamroh ʙo sipohijonas giriftem va ʙa darjo afkandem [va halok kardem]; dar hole ki [dar lahzai marg xudro ʙa xotiri nofarmoni va kufras] sarzanis mekard
51|41|Dar [dostoni qavmi] Od [niz darsi iʙratest]; on goh ki tundʙode ʙe xajru ʙarakat ʙar onon firistodem
51|42|[Tundʙode] Ki ʙar har ciz vazid, xoku xosokas kard
51|43|Dar [dostoni qavmi] Samud [niz darsi iʙrate ast] on goh ki [tavassuti pajomʙarason Soleh] ʙa onon gufta sud: «Andake [az lazzathoi zindagi] ʙahramand saved [ki tanho se ruz fursat dored]»
51|44|Onon az farmoni Parvardigorason sarpeci kardand; pas, dar hole ki [ʙa casmi xud azoʙro] medidand, soiqa ononro faro girift
51|45|[Cunon ʙar zamin aftodand, ki] Na tavoni ʙarxostan [va gurez] dostand va na joroi difo'
51|46|Pes az on qavmi Nuhro, ki guruhe nofarmon ʙudand [halok kardem]
51|47|Mo osmonro ʙa tavon [-i xud] ʙino nihodem va hamvora onro vus'at meʙaxsem
51|48|Va zaminro [ʙaroi zindagi] gusturdem va ci nek gusturonandae hastem
51|49|Va hama cizro ʙa surati zavc [cuft] ofaridem; ʙosad, ki [tavaccuh kuned va] pand gired
51|50|[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa mardum ʙigu:] «Pas, ʙa suji Alloh taolo ʙistoʙed, ki man az coniʙi U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram
51|51|Va dar kanori Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digare qaror nadihed, jaqinan, man az [coniʙi] U ʙaroi sumo husdordihandae oskoram»
51|52|Har pajomʙare, ki ʙar pesinijonason maʙ'us sud, hamin guna guftand: «[U jo] Codugar ast jo devona»
51|53|Ojo jakdigarro ʙa in [kufru takziʙ] suporis karda ʙudand? Na, ʙalki mardume sarkas ʙudand
51|54|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az onon ruj ʙigardon, ki tu [ʙa xotiri kufri onon] hargiz sazovori sarzanis nesti
51|55|Va [pajvasta ʙa onon] tazakkur ʙideh, ki, hatman, tazakkur ʙaroi mu'minon sudʙaxs ast
51|56|Va cinnu insro faqat ʙaroi in ofaridam, ki Maro iʙodat kunand [va az ʙandagii digaron sar ʙoz zanand]
51|57|Na az onon ruzi mexoham, na in ki Maro xurok dihand
51|58|[Zero] Alloh taolo ast, ki ruzirasoni nerumand va ʙarqaror ast
51|59|Sitamgoron [-i musrik niz] hamcun joron [-i guzasta]-i xes sahme az azoʙ dorand; pas, ʙa sitoʙ [onro] az Man naxohand
51|60|Pas, voj ʙar kofiron az [azoʙi] ruzi mav'udason
52|1|Savgand ʙa kuhi Tur
52|2|va savgand ʙa kitoʙi navistasuda
52|3|Dar sahifahoi kusuda
52|4|Va savgand ʙa «Bajtu-l-ma'mur» [ki faristagon dar on ʙa iʙodati Parvardigor masƣuland]
52|5|Va savgand ʙa [osmoni ʙaland hamon] saqfi ʙarafrosta [ʙar zamin]
52|6|Va savgand ʙa darjoi oganda [az oʙ]
52|7|Ki ʙe tardid, azoʙi Parvardigorat ʙa vuqu' xohad pajvast
52|8|Va hec ʙozdorandae onro ʙoznadorad
52|9|Ruze, ki osmon ʙa saxti dar cunʙis va iztiroʙ aftad
52|10|Va kuhho ʙa harakate sadid ravon savand
52|11|Dar on ruz voj ʙa holi takziʙkunandagon
52|12|Hamon kasone, ki dar ʙehudagui sargarmi ʙoziand
52|13|Ruze, ki ʙo xusunat ʙa suji otasi duzax ronda mesavand
52|14|[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «In [hamon] otasest, ki onro duruƣ mepindosted
52|15|Ojo in [otasu azoʙi] codust jo [hanuz ham onro] nameʙined
52|16|Ba otas daroed [va ʙisuzed], ki sikeʙoi va nosikeʙoii sumo [dar ʙaroʙari su'lahoi suzonas] ʙarojaton jakson ast; tanho dar ʙaroʙari on ci kardaed, mucozot mesaved»
52|17|Ba rosti, ki parhezkoron dar ʙoƣhoi ʙihist dar nozu ne'matand
52|18|Va az ʙaxsishoi [ʙedareƣi] Parvardigorason va az in ki az azoʙi duzax nigohason dostaast, sodmonand
52|19|[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Ba podosi kirdoraton [dar dunjo inak] guvoro ʙixured va ʙiosomed»
52|20|Dar hole ki ʙar taxthoe radifsuda takja zadaand va huroni ƣizolcasmro ʙa hamsarii onon darmeovarem

52|21|Mu'minone, ki farzandonason dar imon pajravi onon ʙudand, farzandonasonro [niz dar ʙihist] ʙa onon mulhaq xohem kard va az [podosi] amalason zarrae namekohem; caro ki [sarnavisti] har kas dar garavi dastovardi xudi ust
52|22|[Dar ʙihist az] Har nav' meva va guste, ki ʙixohand, pajdarpaj dar dastrasason qaror medihem
52|23|Dar on co comhoi saroʙe az dasti jakdigar megirand, ki na muciʙi ʙehudagui ast va na gunoh
52|24|Va navcavonone [ki ʙaroi xidmat] peromunason dar raftu omadand, gui [az zeʙoi va sapedrui] hamcun marvoride dar sadaf hastand
52|25|[Bihistijon] Ba jakdigar ru meovarand va az [dunjo va ahvoli guzastai] xud suol mekunand
52|26|Megujand: «Mo dar dunjo dar xonavodai xud [az azoʙi ilohi] metarsidem
52|27|Alloh taolo [ʙo ne'mti islom] ʙar mo minnat nihod va az azoʙi suzon [-i duzax] hifzamon kard
52|28|Mo dar zindagii dunjo hamvora Uro [parastis mekardem va ʙa ruʙuʙijat] mexondem. Be tardid, U nakukoru mehruʙon ast
52|29|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar, ʙo ojoti Qur'on ʙa mardum] andarz ʙideh, ki ʙa lutfi Parvardigorat [tu ʙar xilofi iddaoi kofiron] na kohini va na macnun
52|30|Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Soirest, ki muntazirem, to margas faro rasad [va az suxanonas rahoi joʙem]?»
52|31|Bigu: «Muntazir [-i margi man] ʙosed; man niz ʙo sumo muntazir xoham mond [to azoʙatonro ʙa casm ʙinam]»
52|32|Ojo aqlhojason ʙa [ʙajoni] in [suxanoni ʙotil] hukm mekunad, jo [asosan] mardume sarkas hastand
52|33|Ojo megujand: «[Muhammad] Qur'onro ca'l kardaast?». [Hargiz cunin nest] Balki [ƣarq dar takaʙʙurand, ki] imon nameovarand
52|34|Agar rost megujand, suxane monandi on ʙijovarand
52|35|Ojo onon az hec ofarida sudaand jo xud ofarinandai xesand
52|36|Ojo onon osmonho va zaminro ofaridaand? [Na] Balki onon jaqin nadorand [ki Alloh taolo ofarinandai mutlaq ast]
52|37|Ojo gancinahoi [ne'mat va hidojati] Parvardigorat nazdi eson ast? Ojo [ʙar hama ciz] tasallut dorand
52|38|Ojo nardʙone dorand, ki ʙa vasilai on [guftori faristagoni vahjro] mesunavand? Pas, har ki sunidaast, ʙojad dalele ravsan ʙijovarad
52|39|Ojo Alloh taolo farzandoni duxtar dorad va sumo pisar
52|40|[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo az onon podose darxost mekuni, ki [az pardoxtas dar rancand va xarcas] ʙarojason [garonu] sangin ast
52|41|Ojo az ilmi ƣajʙ ogohand va [xaʙarhoi nihonro] menavisand
52|42|Ojo qasdi najrang[va naqsai palide ʙarojat] dorand? Vale kofiron xud giriftori najrang [va tadʙiri ilohi] hastand
52|43|Ojo onon ma'ʙude ƣajr az Alloh taolo dorand? Alloh taolo az on ci ʙo U sarik qaror medihand, poku munazzah ast
52|44|[In kofiron, hatto] Agar porae az osmonro niz dar holi suqut ʙuʙinand, [ʙoz ham imon nameovarand va] megujand: «Aʙre mutarokim ast»
52|45|Pas, ononro [ʙa holi xud] raho kun, to ʙo ruzi mav'udason, ki [ʙo naxustin damidani sur] madhusi marg megardand, muvoceh savand
52|46|Ruze, ki najrangason sudmand naxohad ʙud va [az hec su] jori namesavand
52|47|Sitamgoron [dar dunjo niz ʙa dasti mu'minon] ʙa azoʙi digare giriftor xohand sud; vale ʙestarason namedonand
52|48|[Ej Pajomʙar] Dar ʙaroʙari hukmi Parvardigorat sikeʙo ʙos; zero tu tahti nazar va hifozati Moi; va hangome ki [az xoʙ jo ʙa qasdi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, Parvardigoratro ʙa poki sitois kun
52|49|Va niz [dar pose] az saʙ Uro sitois kun [va namoz ʙiguzor] va ʙa hangomi nopadid sudani sitoragon [dar sapedadam niz namozi suʙh ʙiguzor]
53|1|Savgand ʙa sitora, on goh ki nopadid savad
53|2|Ki jori sumo [Muhammad] hargiz gumroh nasuda va ʙa rohi taʙohe naaftodaast
53|3|Va az ruji havoi nafs suxan namegujad
53|4|[In Qur'on] Vahj [-i ilohi] ast, ki [ʙa u] ilqo mesavad. In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
53|5|[Caʙrail, ki faristae ast] Purtavon ta'limas dodaast
53|6|[Hamon faristai] Xusmanzare, ki [ʙo cehrai haqiqias dar ʙaroʙari Pajomʙar] istod
53|7|Dar hole ki u dar ufuqi ʙolo [dar osmon] qaror dost
53|8|Sipas [Caʙrail] nazdik sud; va nazdiktar
53|9|Pas, [fosilai u ʙo Pajomʙar] ʙa andozai tuli du kamon kamtar ʙud
53|10|On goh [on faristai ʙuzurgvor] on ciro, ki ʙojad ʙa ʙandai Alloh taolo vahj mekard, vahj namud
53|11|On ciro, ki [pajomʙar] did, qalʙas duruƣ napindost
53|12|Ojo ʙo u dar ʙorai on ci meʙinad, mucodala mekuned
53|13|Dar haqiqat, pajomʙar jak ʙori digar niz on faristaro [ʙa surati komil] musohida karda ʙud
53|14|Dar kanori [daraxti ʙuzurg] «Sidratu-l-muntaho» [dar osmoni haftum]
53|15|ki oromisgohi ʙihist hamon cost
53|16|On goh ki holate on daraxtro pusonida ʙud
53|17|Casmi [pajomʙar ʙa capu rost] munharif nasud va [az had] tacovuz nakard
53|18|Ba rosti, ki u ʙarxe az ʙuzurgtarin nisonahoi Parvardigorasro [dar on co] musohida kard
53|19|[Ej musrikon] Ojo «Lot»-u «Uzzo»-ro didaed
53|20|Va «Mannot» on savumin [ʙuti ʙearzis]-ro? [Ojo hec sudu zijone ʙa sumo merasonand]
53|21|Ojo [iddao mekuned, ki] farzandi pisar ʙaroi sumost va duxtar ʙaroi Alloh taolo
53|22|Dar in surat, taqsime noodilona ast

53|23|In ʙutho faqat ismhoe [ʙema'no] hastand, ki xud va padaronaton ʙo onho [ma'ʙudhoi duruƣini xudro] nom nihodaed va Alloh taolo hec dalele [ʙar haqqonijati in kor] nozil nakardaast. [Musrikon dar e'tiqodotason] Faqat pajravi gumonu xostahoi dili xesand; hol on ki [muciʙoti] hidojat az coniʙi Parvardigorason ʙar onon rasidaast
53|24|Ojo inson har ci [az safoati in ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] orzu kunad, ʙarojas mujassar ast
53|25|Dunjo va oxirat az oni Alloh ast [va ʙa har kas, har ciro saloh ʙidonad meʙaxsad]
53|26|Ci ʙisjor faristagone, ki dar osmonho hastand, ki safoatason ʙa hec vach sudmand naxohad ʙud; magar pas az on ki Alloh taolo ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad va xusnud ʙosad, icozat dihad
53|27|Kasone, ki ʙa oxirat ʙovar nadorand, ʙar faristagoni ilohi nomi duxtar meguzorand [va ononro duxtaroni Alloh taolo medonand]
53|28|Onon dar mavridi in amr [komilan] ʙeittiloand [va] faqat az hadsu gumon pajravi mekunand; dar hole ki ʙaroi [sinoxti] haqiqat gumon kofi nest
53|29|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] tu niz az kase, ki az jodi Mo ruj gardonida va faqat [lazzathoi] zindagii dunjoro mexohad, ruj ʙartoʙ
53|30|Nihojati darku fahmason hamin ast. Be tardid, Parvardigorat ʙa holi kasone, ki az rohi U munharif sudaand ogohtar ast; va niz ʙa holi rohjoftagon

53|31|Har ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Alloh taolo ast, [rohi xajru sarro ʙa inson iroa kard] to ʙadkoronro dar ʙaroʙari raftorason kajfar dihad va nakukoronro [ʙo ne'mathoi ʙihist] podosi naku ato namojad

53|32|Hamon kasone, ki az gunohoni kaʙira va korhoi zistu ʙesarmona duri mekunand; magar laƣƶishoi kamahamijat [va gunohoni saƣira, ki ʙo tavʙa va iʙodat ʙaxsida mesavand], ki omurzisi Parvardigorat gusturda ast; az hamon dam, ki sumoro az zamin padid ovard va on goh ki ʙa surati canin dar sikami modaronaton ʙuded, ʙa [taʙiati] sumo ogohtar [az xudaton] ast; pas, xudsitoi nakuned, ki U ʙa holi parhezkoron donotar ast
53|33|Ojo on kasero, ki [az haq] ruj ʙartoft, didai
53|34|Va andake infoq kard va [sipas] xuddori namud
53|35|Ojo ilmi ƣajʙ dorad va [ojandaro] meʙinad
53|36|Ojo ʙoxaʙar nasudaast az matoliʙi kitoʙi osmonii Muso
53|37|va [ta'limoti] Iʙrohim, ki haqqi [risolat va ʙandagii Mo]-ro ʙa tamomi ado kard
53|38|Ki hec gunahgore ʙori gunohi digarero ʙar dus naxohad kasid
53|39|Va in ki inson faqat samarai talos [-u nijati] xudro xohad dost
53|40|Va in ki ʙe gumon talosi u [dar muhosiʙai a'molas dar ruzi qijomat] manzur xohad sud
53|41|On goh podosasro ʙa tamomi xohand dod
53|42|Va in ki ʙozgast [-i hamai umur] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
53|43|Va Ust, ki mexandonad va megirjonad
53|44|Va Ust, ki memironad va [dar oxirat] zinda mekunad
53|45|Va ham Ust, ki zavci naru modaro meofarad
53|46|az nutfae, ki [dar rahim] rexta mesavad
53|47|va padid ovardani duʙorai onho [dar qijomat niz ʙar uhdai] Alloh taolo ast
53|48|Va Ust, ki [sumoro] ʙenijoz mekunad va sarmoja meʙaxsad
53|49|Va Ust, ki Parvardigori [sitorai] «Si'ro» ast
53|50|Va Ust, ki qavmi Odro dar guzasta halok kard
53|51|Va qavmi Samudro [niz noʙud kard] va [hec jak az ononro] ʙoqi naguzost
53|52|Va qavmi Nuhro, ki sitamgortar va sarkastar ʙudand, pes az on [halok namud]
53|53|Va sahrhoi zerurusuda [-i qavmi Lut]-ro dar ham kuʙid
53|54|Va ononro [ʙo azoʙe farogir] – cunon ki ʙojad pusonid
53|55|Hol [ej inson] dar mavridi kadom jak az ne'mathoi Parvardigorat tardid ravo medori [va mucodala mekuni]
53|56|In [pajomʙar niz] husdordihandaest az [guruhi] husdordihandagoni pesin
53|57|Qijomat nazdik mesavad
53|58|Va hec kas – cuz Alloh taolo – nametavonad oskoras kunad [va saxtihojasro ʙartaraf sozad]
53|59|[Ej musrikon] Ojo az in suxan dar sigifted
53|60|Va dar holi ƣaflat va ƣurur [ʙa ojoti Qur'on] mexanded va [az sunidani husdorhojas nametarsed va] ask namerezed
53|61|Va sumo ʙozikunandagoned
53|62|Pas, [hamagi] ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda kuned va [tanho] Uro ʙiparasted
54|1|Qijomat nazdik sud va moh [az ham] sikoft
54|2|Agar [kofiron] mu'cizae ʙuʙinand, ru megardonand va megujand: «[In] Codue [ʙotilu] zudguzar ast»
54|3|Onon [ojot va nisonahoi ilohiro] duruƣ mepindorand va az havoi nafsi xes pajravi mekunand; va har amre [az podosu kajfarhoi qijomat] dar zamoni maxsus ʙa xud qaror dorad
54|4|Va mutmainan [mocaroi azoʙi aqvomi guzasta va] axʙore, ki ʙoisi dast kasidan az gunoh mesavad, ʙa musrikon rasidaast
54|5|In [ojoti ilohi donisu] hikmate rasost; vale [ʙaroi afrodi lacuc] husdorho sude nadorad
54|6|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] az onon ru ʙartoʙ, [va muntaziri] ruze [ʙos], ki [faristai] da'vatkunanda [ʙo damidan dar sur] ononro ʙa amre ʙas dusvor [-u vahsatnok] faro ʙixonad
54|7|Bo didagoni furuaftoda [az vahsat] az gurho xoric mesavand; [harakatason ʙa suji dodgohi ilohi cunon ast, ki] gui malaxhoe parokandaand
54|8|[Harosnok] Ba suji munodi [-i mahsar] mesitoʙand va kofiron megujand: «Imruz ruzi dusvore ast»
54|9|Pes az onon niz qavmi Nuh [pajomʙarasonro] takziʙ kardand va ʙandai Moro duruƣgu xondand va guftand: «Devona ast»; va uro saxt ozurdand
54|10|Pas, u Parvardigorasro xond [va guft]: «Man maƣluʙ sudaam; pas, joriam farmo [va az onon intiqom ʙigir]»
54|11|Mo niz darhoi osmonro ʙaroi [rezisi] ʙoroni seloso kusudem
54|12|Va az zamin niz casmaho cori soxtem va oʙho [az zaminu osmon] ʙaroi tufone, ki muqaddar suda ʙud, ʙa ham pajvast
54|13|Va Nuhro ʙar [kistii] soxta va pardoxta az taxtaho va mexho savor kardem
54|14|Ki tahti nazar [va hifozati] Mo harakat mekard. In podosi kase ʙud, ki [qavmas] inkoras karda ʙudand
54|15|Mo on [kajfaru nacot]-ro nisonae [az qudrati xud] ʙar coj guzostem; ojo pandpazire hast
54|16|Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
54|17|Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
54|18|Qavmi Od [niz pajomʙarasonro] duruƣgu pindostand; pas, [ej ahli Makka, ʙingared, ki] azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
54|19|Mo tundʙode sardu saxtro dar jak ruzi sum va tuloni ʙar onon firistodem
54|20|[Tufone vahsatnok] Ki mardumro cunon az coj mekand, ki gui tanahoi naxli resakansuda ʙudand
54|21|Pas, [ʙingared] ki azoʙu husdorhoi Man ci guna ʙud
54|22|Ba rosti, ki Qur'onro ʙaroi pand giriftan oson soxtem; ojo pandpazire hast
54|23|Qavmi Samud [niz] husdorkunandagonro duruƣgu pindostand
54|24|Onon guftand: «Ojo [sazovor ast] ʙasare az mijoni xudamonro pajravi kunem? Dar on surat dar gumrohi va sardargumi xohem ʙud
54|25|Ojo az mijoni hamai mo tanho ʙar u vahj nozil sudaast? [Cunin nest] Balki u duruƣgue xudpisand ast»
54|26|Fardo xohand donist, ki duruƣgui xudpisand kist
54|27|[Ba Soleh guftem] «Baroi ozmoisi onon modasuture [-ro, ki darxost kardaand, az dili kuh ʙa sujason] xohem firistod; pas, muroqiʙi raftorason ʙos va [ʙar ozorason] sikeʙoi kun
54|28|Va ʙa onon e'lom kun, ki oʙi [coh] ʙajni eson [va on modasutur] sahmijaʙandi sudaast va har ki dar navʙati xud ʙojad hozir savad»
54|29|Vale onon hamdastasonro nido dodand; u niz dast ʙa kor sud va [suturro] ʙa qatl rasond
